Alright folks, {{champion:64}} here! {{champion:103}} ready for our greatest challenge yet? In this {{champion:63}} new pun thread, we need to make {{champion:60}} a {{champion:26}} puns without using {{champion:1}} Garen icons. It would truly be a {{champion:21}} if we never achieved this wonderful {{champion:254}} {{champion:14}}. It may be a {{champion:150}}ly task, but our efforts will not be in {{champion:67}}! So if we are {{champion:203}} spirits, let us join together until our laughter {{champion:245}}s throughout the boards!
